data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Thomas Henry is on target to give Oud-Heverlee a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 19, Xavier Mercier instrumental with a fine assist.
Alexandre Boucaut blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 63, Oud-Heverlee take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Kamal Sowah.
Xavier Mercier with an assist there.
The away team replace Jelle Vossen with Nikolaos Kenourgios.
In the minute 67, The away team have replaced Cameron Humphreys with Saido Berahino. This is the second substitution made today by Francky Dury.
Goal! Saido Berahino pulls one back to make it 2-1.
Great play from Daniel Opare to set up the goal.
In the minute 74, Kamal Sowah is booked for the home team.
Oud-Heverlee make their first substitution with Barnabas Bese replacing Derrick Tshimanga.
Bassem Srarfi (Zulte) has replaced the possibly injured Daniel Opare.
In the minute 88, Pierre-Yves Ngawa is replacing Kristiyan Malinov for the home team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Olivier Myny is on a sub for Mathieu Maertens for Oud-Heverlee.
